channel.title: Need help with CASE 53 in testscape(use item on item)
channel.description:
Is there any way to fix case 53: (Use Item on another Item)?
when i take the /* away from /*if (IsUsingSkill == false) { and */ away from }*/ the server freezez when i add 2 items together :(
im using testscape (cheezescape origin)

item.title: Need help with CASE 53 in testscape(use item on item)
item.dc:creator: @Rune_King_Omega Rune King Omega
item.description:
@Rune_King_Omega wrote:

when i take the /* and */ away, i use 2 items together and it dissconnects the client,if i dont take them away it doesn’t do anything… so what do you meen ? How wouldi fix?

this is the part that was changed

/*if (IsUsingSkill == false) { IsUsingSkill = true; useitems[3] = inStream.readUnsignedWordA(); //use item slot useitems[1] = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndianA(); //used item useitems[2] = (int)(misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 1, 1) / 1000); //used item slot useitems[0] = playerItems[useitems[3]]; //used item id useitems[0] -= 1; //Only to fix the ID ! CheckForSkillUse(); }*/

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with CASE 53 in testscape(use item on item)
